posts.title: Crystal Skull Shot Glass
posts.content: Drink from the skull of doom with this Crystal Skull Shot Glass. Able to hold up to 2.5 ounces of your favorite liquor in it’s unique inverted skull shape, you’ll look like such a cool guy as you look straight in the eyes and down your shots.

posts.title: Prescription Bottle Coffee Mug
posts.content: Get your morning fix by ingesting a full dose of caffeine with the prescription bottle coffee mug. For those of us who need a nice hot cup of joe to get the day started, this the comical coffee mug is the ideal way to kickstart things in the morning with some legal stimulants.

posts.title: LED Color Spectrum Clock
posts.content: Make any plain wall pop by hanging up this LED color spectrum clock. Rather than bore you with a face full of numbers, this clock comes equipped with sixty LEDs that shine bright in every color under the sun and can be set to display various vibrant patterns.

posts.title: Star Wars LEGO AT-AT Walker
posts.content: Recreate epic galactic battles from the comfort of home with the Star Wars LEGO AT-AT Walker. Once its been fully assembled, the AT-AT stands over a foot tall and features a moving head with enough space in the cockpit for two LEGO Stormtroopers.

posts.title: Seated Zip Line Kit
posts.content: Experience a mini adrenaline rush from the comfort of home with the seated zip line kit. Forget about those lame tree houses or swing sets, they don’t even come close to providing the thrill that zipping across the yard suspended in mid-air can provide!

posts.title: The Walking Dead Pop-Up Book
posts.content: Everyone’s favorite zombie series comes alive like never before inside the pages of The Walking Dead pop-up book. The book depicts five key elements from the series in terrifyingly gory detail – like the zombie in the well, the secrets of Terminus, and the prison.

posts.title: Money Origami Instruction Book
posts.content: Learn how to create amazing works of art with the money origami instruction book. This book will teach you how to create incredible sculptures using the dollar bills in your wallet. Even with the dollar on the decline, your money will keep face value thanks to this ancient art.

posts.title: Firefighter Water Blaster Toy
posts.content: No pool? No problem! With the firefighter water blaster toy your kids will be able to enjoy summer the way it was meant to be enjoyed. The firefighter toy transforms any garden hose into a high powered water cannon that will entertain for hours on end.

posts.title: Hands Free Dog Leash
posts.content: Walk, jog, or run with your furry friend  the smart way with the hands free dog leash. The leash attaches to a special belt around worn your waist, ensuring Rex stays tethered to you while your hands remain free. It’s ideal for scenic runs with your loyal jogging partner.

posts.title: Disappointing Cleveland Sport Moments
posts.content: Nothing says you’re a true fan like putting yourself through constant agony watching your team trying to triumph. The disappointing Cleveland sports moments book captures all these instances and adds commentary to each gut-wrenching piece of history.

posts.title: Bottle Launcher
posts.content: Turn any soda bottle into a glorious water powered rocket using the bottle launcher.  The compact design provides a sturdy base for the bottle and allows you to safely launch a 2 liter plastic bottle straight up into the cosmos using nothing more than a hand pump.

posts.title: Nest Cam Outdoor Security Camera
posts.content: Make your humble abode as secure as possible by ramping up your outdoor security with the Nest Cam outdoor camera. This compact weatherproof 130 degree wide-angle camera captures crisp 1080p footage day or night, and is compatible with Amazon Alexa.
